data.title: Summer Internship Project On Jewellery Industry
data.meta_description: summer internship project on jewellery industry - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides details about a study on changing consumer behavior from gold jewelry to diamond jewelry in Jaipur, India. The objectives are to understand consumer buying behavior and perceptions of gold versus diamond jewelry. The scope discusses how factors like season, age, and trends influence preferences. It also reviews literature on the growing branded jewelry market in India and shift from investment to fashion-oriented pieces. Primary data will be collected through consumer surveys in Jaipur, while secondary data comes from sources like reports and journals. Finally, it outlines the history and operations of Birdhichand Ghanshyamdas Jewellers, a leading Indian jewelry manufacturer and exporter based in Jaipur.
